name: A Night In The Turbolift
description:
A Night In The Turbolift is a visual novel rendering of the events of an imaginary episode of an imaginary Star Trek series. It's also my first foray into visual novels using Ren'py.

This story stars Lieutenants Lwiassi Azodi and T'neth. Lwiassi is a Betazoid and T'neth is a Vulcan.

The bulk of the story takes place in 2370, with flashbacks to 2364 and 2365.

Though this visual novel does feature choices, no choice seriously affects the outcome of the story, and there is only one main path.

This story is fairly short. It should take you less than an hour to get all the way through it, depending on how quickly you read.

NOTE: This story contains depictions of ableism, sci-fi racism, and discussions regarding sex.
